p: The body length of sexually mature females ranged from 12 cm to 26 cm, while that of mature males ranged from 13 cm to 23 cm. The cumulative frequency curve of individuals that had reached or passed maturity stage 3 indicated that nearly 50% (L 50) of females were mature at 17.50 cm and 50% of males were mature at 16.60 cm ( Fig 8).
